snippet: An automated stock trading program suddenly flooded the market with millions of trades on Wednesday, spreading turmoil across Wall Street and drawing renewed attention to the fragility and instability of the nation's stock markets.
abstract: An automated stock trading program suddenly flooded the market with millions of trades on Wednesday, spreading turmoil across Wall Street and drawing renewed attention to the fragility and instability of the nation's stock markets.

headline.main: Flood of Errant Trades Is a Black Eye for Wall Street
